attributes.action: Make bicycles have a number plate so they can be identified
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although there are many responsible cyclists on the road, there are unfortunately also too many cyclists who think they can break the law and get away with it because they can't be identified. Jumping the red lights, riding on pavements etc. Cycles should have number plates to make them more responsible and so they can be identified when breaking the law or causing an accident.  Public safety is more important than cost.
